Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the sizing handle of a scroll bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.SizeBox class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the sizing handle of a scroll bar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.SizeBox.RightAlign%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarSizeBox1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
